channel for notifications of Location Service
This app requires access to your location to work.
Routes might change during bank holidays, celebration periods, etc. You can find information in the Dublin Bus News tab on the main screen.
Dublin Bus Alarm will make your trips more comfortable and relaxed by letting you know when you arrive at your destination.
When you\'re 100 meters away from the stop, DBA will set off an alarm to let you know!

"In order for DBA to do its job, it needs to know your location. It will be used to display your position on the map and know when you've arrived at your destination. \n\nPlease, accept the location permission request on the next screen."

Some device manufacturers implement their own battery optimizations that can prevent the alarm from ringing.

 DBA can't detect these proprietary settings, so it's recommended that you test the alarm to make sure everything is OK.
 You'll be able to test the alarm on the main screen.
